references.name: Piotr Lewandowski
references.reference:
Anıl worked as an intern at our company. Throughout his internship, he had the opportunity to contribute to several projects. He displayed an outstanding level of work ethic. Anıl is very open minded software developer who is always ready to learn. His personality and positive attitude brought a lot of value to out team. 

I believe that Anıl Selvi will be a great asset to any organization that he will be employed in.
